data.name: At_Label
data.comment: Start at (a date)

data.name: DailyRepeatCustomDaysNonRecurringText
data.comment: {0} - is placeholder for day of week (Monday, Tuesday…), {1}- when the job will occur for first time (and will occur at this time during next occurrence)

data.name: DailyRepeatCustomDaysRecurringText
data.comment: {0} - is placeholder for day of week (Monday, Tuesday…) {1} –placeholder for how often the job will repeat (on every 2 hours or on every 40 minutes…) {2}- when the job will occur for first time (and will occur at this time during next occurrence)

data.name: DailyRepeatEveryDayNonRecurringText
data.comment: {0} is a time like seven o clock

data.name: DailyRepeatEveryDayRecurringText
data.value: Repeats every day from {1} to {2} every {0}
data.comment: {0} can be minutes our hours. {1} is time like 7 o clock, you can slo translate "executed" instead of "repeated"

data.name: DailyRepeatEvery_Max_Text
data.value: Value for "{1}" cannot be greater than {0}

data.name: DailyRepeatEvery_Min_Text
data.value: Value for "{1}" cannot be less than {0}

data.name: Daily_Custom_Occurrence_Friday_Label
data.comment: Fr is short form for Friday, use the short form common in your language

data.name: Daily_Custom_Occurrence_Monday_Label
data.comment: Mo is short form for Monday, use the short form common in your language

data.name: Daily_Custom_Occurrence_Saturday_Label
data.comment: Sa is short form for Saturday, use the short form common in your language

data.name: Daily_Custom_Occurrence_Sunday_Label
data.comment: Su is short form for Sunday, use the short form common in your language

data.name: Daily_Custom_Occurrence_Thursday_Label
data.comment: Do is short form for Thursday, use the short form common in your language

data.name: Daily_Custom_Occurrence_Tuesday_Label
data.comment: Tue is short form for Tuesday, use the short form common in your language

data.name: Daily_Custom_Occurrence_Wednesday_Label
data.comment: Wed is short form for Wednesday, use the short form common in your language

data.name: EndDateNeverText
data.comment: meant is: repeat never

data.name: EndTimeIsBeforeStartTimeErrorText
data.value: The time for the start must be before the time for the end.
data.comment: Error message which appears when End at has smaller value than Start at time component

data.name: End_At_Label
data.comment: it follows a time: "End at 7 o clock"

data.name: First
data.comment: meant is: "Repeat on the first Monday" or "Repeat on the second Tuesday"

data.name: Fourth
data.comment: meant is: "Repeat on the fourth Monday" or "Repeat on the fourth Tuesday"

data.name: Hours_Label
data.comment: meant is: every x hours

data.name: Last
data.comment: refer: Last Monday of the Month”, Last Friday of the Month

data.name: Minutes_Label
data.comment: meant is: every x minutes

data.name: MissingDailyRepeatEvery_Text
data.value: Please enter a value for field "{0}"

data.name: MonthlyRepeatByMonthdaySummaryText
data.comment: {0} monthly; {1} Date; {2} is time; meant is: Repeat monthly on 4th at 2 o clock

data.name: MonthlyRepeatByWeekdaySummaryText
data.comment: {0}- one of the values: Every Month, Every 2 Months, Every 3 Months, Every 4 Months, Every 6 Months (these strings are get from the resources) {1}-one of the values: First, Second, Third, Fourth (these strings are get from the resources) {2}-day of week {3}- when the job will occur for first time (and will occur at this time during next occurrence)

data.name: On_Label
data.comment: Meant is: On Monday, On Tuesday etc

data.name: On_the_Label
data.comment: meant is: "Repeat on the First Monday" or "Repeat on the Third Tuesday"

data.name: Repeat_Every_Label
data.comment: Meant is: "is executed every xx minutes" or "is executed every xx hours". Translation of "every" has to fit for both minutes and hours

data.name: Repeat_Label
data.comment: it follows "Weekly, "Monthly", "Daily" or "Never". Maybe you want to use "Execution" in sense of "Execution of the schedule".

data.name: Second
data.comment: meant is: "Repeat on the second Monday" or "Repeat on the second Tuesday"

data.name: SelectDayErrorText
data.value: Please select at least one day of a week!

data.name: Start_At_Label
data.comment: It floows a date "Start at 22/04/2016"

data.name: Summary_Label
data.comment: Contains a sentence where the scheduling is described

data.name: Third
data.comment: meant is: "Repeat on the first Monday" or "Repeat on the second Tuesday"

data.name: Weekdays
data.comment: meant is: Repeat at weekdays

data.name: Weekends
data.comment: meant is: Repeat at weekends

data.name: WeeklyRepeatSummaryText
data.comment: {0}-one of the values: Every Week, Every 2 Weeks, Every 3 Weeks (these strings are get from the resources) {1}-day of week {2}- when the job will occur for first time (and will occur at this time during next occurrence)

data.name: day_first
data.comment: part of: first day

data.name: day_other
data.comment: part of: [x]th day (not first, second and third, but following)

data.name: day_second
data.comment: part of: second day

data.name: day_third
data.comment: part of: third day
